*The information on this page is tailored to Macalester students but may be relevant to others.*


## Internships, summer programs, graduate school

- Check out a [resource guide](https://docs.google.com/document/d/19wlevPT0p1WF7oG9ccFEN5MrRXJBK9zHuSkVSoel6v8/edit?usp=sharing) that Brianna updates regularly. 

- To request a letter of recommendation for a summer program or graduate school, you'll complete [this form](https://forms.gle/nQgsiBDjmCKRb2vbA) after Brianna agrees to write the letter.

- To request that a job reference or internship supervisor, please email Brianna with details about the position.
